text: Welcome everybody. Um, I'm really happy

for machines and diggers and technical
things, sci-fi and machinery.
And over the past 15 years, I've been
lucky to work with many people across a
lot of industries. I started in

publishing, fashion, retail,
and now um yeah, for almost the last 10
years, I've been working in automotive
and the last four of those with a
company called Rapid. And that's what
we're going to talk about today.
So at Rapid, we're not just a CGI
company. Um we have quite a big and

best of creativity, technology,
strategy.
We're around 100 people and one of the
really cool things about working there
is it's about 50% artists and 50%
developers and tech.

solutions for different types of
clients.
